Get the cast and crew of a show or movie

Source: R/trakt-people.R
media_people.Rd

Returns all cast and crew for a show/movie, depending on how much data is available.

trakt.shows.people(target, extended = c("min", "full"))

trakt.movies.people(target, extended = c("min", "full"))

Arguments

target

character(1): The ID of the item requested. Preferably the Trakt ID (e.g. 1390), slug (e.g. "game-of-thrones"), or IMDb ID (e.g. "tt0944947"). Can also be of length greater than 1, in which case the function is called on all target values separately and the result is combined.
extended

character(1): Either "min" (API default) or "full". The latter returns more variables and should generally only be used if required.

Value

A list of one or more tibbles for cast and crew. The latter tibble objects are as flat as possible.

See also

people_media, for the other direction: People that have credits in shows/movies.

Other people data: people_media, trakt.people.summary

Examples

trakt.shows.people("breaking-bad")
#> $cast
#> # A tibble: 8 x 6
#>   character      name        trakt  slug                          imdb    tmdb  
#>   <chr>          <chr>       <chr>  <chr>                         <chr>   <chr> 
#> 1 Walter White   Bryan Cran… 297737 bryan-cranston                nm0186… 17419 
#> 2 Skyler White   Anna Gunn   420986 anna-gunn                     nm0348… 134531

#> 4 Hank Schrader  Dean Norris 415192 dean-norris                   nm0606… 14329 
#> 5 Marie Schrader Betsy Bran… 436547 betsy-brandt                  nm1336… 12179…
#> 6 Walter White … RJ Mitte    459150 rj-mitte-06c377f6-88c1-4969-… nm2666… 209674
#> 7 Mike Ehrmantr… Jonathan B… 411251 jonathan-banks                nm0052… 783   
#> 8 Saul Goodman   Bob Odenki… 294857 bob-odenkirk                  nm0644… 59410 
#>
